exceptions.exn: In environment S : Set G : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S O : S Opp : S -> S H0 : intern S G Add H : associativity S Add H1 : neutral S G Add O H3 : opposite S G Add O Opp x : S H2 : G x The term "H" has type "associativity S Add" while it is expected to have type "is_group".

original: unfold is_group in |- *; intuition. apply (opp_unicity H x (Opp x)); auto.
